form.pleaseSelectOne: Please select at least one refund option

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
importantNotes.timezone: Cancellation policies apply to the booking start time in Uzbekistan timezone
importantNotes.processingTime: Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days
importantNotes.serviceFees: Service fees are non-refundable unless specified otherwise

flexible_14_day.label: Flexible 14-Day
flexible_14_day.description: Full refund if canceled 14+ days before check-in
flexible_14_day.detailedDescription: Get a full refund if you cancel your booking at least 14 days before your scheduled check-in time.

moderate_7_day.label: Moderate 7-Day
moderate_7_day.description: 50% refund if canceled 7+ days before check-in
moderate_7_day.detailedDescription: Get a 50% refund if you cancel your booking at least 7 days before your scheduled check-in time.

strict.label: Strict
strict.description: No refund if canceled less than 6 days before check-in
strict.detailedDescription: No refund available if cancellation is made less than 6 days before check-in.

non_refundable.label: Non-refundable
non_refundable.detailedDescription: This booking is non-refundable. No refunds will be provided regardless of cancellation timing.

reschedule_only.label: Reschedule
reschedule_only.description: No refund, but reschedule allowed with 3+ days notice
reschedule_only.detailedDescription: No monetary refunds available, but you can reschedule your booking if you provide at least 3 days notice.
